title: Solo Leveling
description: A hunter rises through the ranks to become the most powerful after gaining a mysterious system.

title: Tower of God
description: A boy enters a mysterious tower in search of his lost friend, but must face countless trials.

title: The Beginning After The End
description: A king is reincarnated into another world, but he struggles with his new role and responsibilities.

title: God of High School
description: Martial artists from around the world compete in a tournament that determines the strongest fighter.

title: Noblesse
description: A powerful noble awakens from a long slumber and must protect his new friends from dark forces.

title: Let's Play
description: A girl struggles to make friends and finds solace in her passion for video games and streaming.

title: I Love Yoo
description: A girl who dislikes romance becomes entangled with two brothers, leading to unexpected feelings.

title: Age Matters
description: A woman in her 29s finds herself working for a younger CEO and navigating their relationship.

title: True Beauty
description: A girl transforms herself into a beauty using makeup, but struggles with her self-image.

title: My Dear Cold-Blooded King
description: A girl finds herself caught up in a web of intrigue and romance with a mysterious king.

title: Let's Play! Dungeon
description: Join a group of heroes as they embark on an epic quest in a world filled with monsters and magic.

title: Spirit Fingers
description: A girl discovers a group of friends who help her find her passion for art and self-expression.

title: A Good Day to Be a Dog
description: A woman turns into a dog when kissed, and she must navigate her new life and romance.

title: Something About Us
description: Two best friends navigate their feelings for each other and the complexities of love.

title: Siren's Lament
description: A girl finds herself drawn into a world of sirens and must choose between love and duty.

title: Lore Olympus
description: A modern retelling of the story of Hades and Persephone in a colorful and vibrant world.

title: The Remarried Empress
description: A queen must navigate the complexities of love and power after remarrying.

title: Cheese in the Trap
description: A college student navigates her complicated relationship with a charming senior.

title: The Devil's Boy
description: A girl becomes entangled with a mysterious boy who harbors dark secrets.

title: Hunting the Divine
description: In a world where gods walk among humans, a young warrior hunts to reclaim his lost family.
